text_paragraphs: Information Note on the Court’s case-law 12

The case concerned the length of civil proceedings instituted by the applicant in May 1992 following a road traffic accident. The proceedings are still pending and have therefore lasted around seven years and six months.
Article 41: The Court awarded the applicant one million escudos (PTE) in respect of non-pecuniary damage.

This summary by the Registry does not bind the Court.
